name: AVPlayer.TimeControlStatus
desc: Constants that indicate the state of playback control.

items.name: case paused
items.desc: A state that indicates the player paused playback indefinitely.

items.name: case waitingToPlayAtSpecifiedRate
items.desc: A state that indicates that the player is waiting for network conditions to improve before it can start or resume playback.

items.name: case playing
items.desc: A state that indicates that the player is currently playing media.
